content.content: Thanks to everyone that joined us on the call today! Here are the notes https://hackmd.io/ynZd1XlHQQeXfV8mottt6g Will transcribe some of these into action items into this post after I get to the office, please use comments and PMs to self organize. @jpitts can create a Prague Volunteers Discourse group for us and we can see if that works as a mini mailing list. I will start a separate thread about the Status EIPs & Interoperability organizing. Contact me directly through my profile: https://ethereum-magicians.org/u/boris Key Resources Registration  https://www.picatic.com/ethmagicians-prague-2018 We’re at about ~110 right now  Agenda Wiki  https://github.com/ethereum-magicians/scrolls/wiki/Council-of-Prague-Agenda overall skeleton, including details on sponsorship – just updated this, still need to add link to budget / sponsorship grid if other tools (e.g. HackMD, GSheet, whatever) end up being more fluid for managing this, go for it  Event Page & Updates  https://ethereumevents.global/events/2018-council-of-prague/ Maintained by Boris, pull requests and other edits welcome via Github https://github.com/spadebuilders/ethereum-events
